title: Prepare for Video Visit
content:
Prepare

To make the most of your time with your provider:

  • Prepare talking points. Write down a few questions or concerns to discuss.
  • Take photos (e.g. rash, acne). You can send them during or before your visit.
  • Upload Documents (e.g. previous test results) you would like to discuss.
  • Strong internet connection. If possible, connect to WiFi.
    • Bright lighting. Light should be directed toward your face.

Arrive Early

  • Sign into DrOnline mobile a few minutes before your scheduled appointment begins.
  • If the visit is for your child, both you and your child must be present for the visit.
  • You will be alerted when your provider arrives.
